article_title: Duke Freshman says no to "Fun Home"
article_text: Yahoo News and Finance Anchor Bianna Golodryga speaks to Brian Grasso, a freshman at Duke University who has created quite a stir by saying he’s not comfortable with everything on his summer reading list. Grasso says he isn’t going to read the graphic novel “Fun Home” because he believes it would compromise his “personal moral Christian beliefs.“

article_summary:
Yahoo News and Finance Anchor Bianna Golodryga speaks to Brian Grasso, a freshman at Duke University who has created quite a stir by saying he’s not comfortable with everything on his summer reading list.
Grasso says he isn’t going to read the graphic novel “Fun Home” because he believes it would compromise his “personal moral Christian beliefs.“
